column4: I think I installed the newest one. Does it differ from compiling?
what is the string from lscpi?
00:1b.0 Audio device: Intel Corporation 82801H (ICH8 Family) HD Audio Controller (rev 03)
you should try compiling alsa from source.
do you think that the source in repos is enough, or should it be the newest one?
no, its the source from the ftp location. Just follow the wiki.
what might be wrong, I get this error while ./cvscompile http://mureakuha.com/paste/?00003b8a521e79bd6b11dc54461a13de
that's strange, it worked for me on two machines. On what command do you get that error?
maybe it means that ICH8 isn't supported in alsa?
running torrent under wine isn't an option?
